item.title: Azure AD Pod Identity
item.author: Author
item.description: Azure Active Directory Pod Identity Hi! I’m Josh, a Cloud Engineer working at a consultancy in Manchester, UK. I’ve been meaning to write on this site for a while, but never really found the time or motivation to do so. With the new year now in full swing, I’ve been inspired by various people in the Azure community (Gregor Suttie, Gwyneth Peña-Siguenza to name a few) to finally make a start.

item.title: Welcome!
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my new blogging site - joshops.co.uk. I’ll be blogging all about Azure and anything else I find interesting along the way. Follow me on Twitter to keep up to date with all new posts. The aim is to have at least 1 post per week, but life may get in the way of that!
